mapper.select: select * from reserve r where mem_id = #{param1} and reserve_num = #{param2} and reserve_state not in (1) order by reserve_date,reserve_idx

select r.*, pay_idx, r.reserve_idx, pay_num, AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(credit_num), SHA2('a-key',512)) AS credit_num, pay_date,pay_state, credit_validity, credit_type, pay_price, pay_mileage, amount from pay p inner join reserve r on r.reserve_idx = p.reserve_idx where reserve_num = #{param1} and pay_state not in (1);
select distinct reserve_num from reserve r where mem_id = #{param1}

select mb.*, m1.*, sum(if(m2.mileage_price > 0, m2.mileage_price, 0)) as mileage_stacked from ( select * from mileage m where mem_id = #{param1} order by m.mileage_date desc limit 1 ) as m1 left outer join mileage m2 on m2.mem_id = m1.mem_id and year(m2.mileage_date) = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y') left outer join `member` mb on m1.mem_id = mb.mem_id

select * from reserve group by reserve_num having mem_id = #{param1} and year(checkoutdate) = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y') and reserve_num not in ( select reserve_num from reserve where reserve_state = 3 )

SELECT r.*, sum(p.amount) as reserve_amount, ro.room_type_name FROM ( SELECT * FROM reserve ORDER BY reserve_date desc, reserve_state desc LIMIT 18446744073709551615 ) as r left outer join pay p on r.reserve_idx = p.reserve_idx left outer join room ro on r.room_num = ro.room_num GROUP BY reserve_num having mem_id = #{param1} order by reserve_date desc
select r.reserve_num, r.mem_id, r.reserve_state, count(*) as reserve_room_cnt from reserve r group by reserve_num, reserve_state having mem_id = #{param1} and reserve_state = 1

select r.reserve_num, r.checkindate, r.checkoutdate, m.mem_name_kr as reserve_name, m.mem_phone as reserve_phone, m.mem_email as reserve_email, r2.room_type_name, sum(r.adult_cnt) as adult_cnt, sum(r.extrabed_cnt) as extrabed_cnt, sum(r.breakfast_cnt) as breakfast_cnt, sum(p.pay_price) as pay_price, sum(p.pay_mileage) as pay_mileage, sum(p.amount) as reserve_amount from reserve r left outer join `member` m on r.mem_id = m.mem_id left outer join room r2 on r.room_num = r2.room_num left outer join pay p on r.reserve_idx = p.reserve_idx where r.mem_id = #{param1} and r.reserve_num = #{param2}

select product_num, product_name, sum(product_cnt) as cnt_by_product, product_price, product_img from ( select c.*, r.reserve_num, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_img from cart c inner join reserve r on r.reserve_num = #{param1} and r.reserve_idx = c.reserve_idx inner join product p on c.product_num = p.product_num ) as c1 group by product_num;

select r.reserve_idx, r.reserve_num, r.reserve_state, ro.room_type, ro.room_num, ro.room_type_name, ro.bed_type from reserve r left outer join room ro on r.room_num = ro.room_num where r.mem_id = #{param1} and r.reserve_num = #{param2}

select r.reserve_idx, r.reserve_state, ro.bed_type, ro.room_type_name, r.adult_cnt, r.extrabed_cnt, r.breakfast_cnt, p.pay_price, p.pay_mileage, p.amount, c.product_num, pr.product_name, c.product_cnt, r.checkindate, pr.product_img, pr.product_price from reserve r left outer join room ro on r.room_num = ro.room_num left outer join pay p on r.reserve_idx = p.reserve_idx left outer join cart c on r.reserve_idx = c.reserve_idx left outer join product pr on c.product_num = pr.product_num where r.mem_id = #{param1} and r.reserve_num = #{param2}
select mileage_idx,mem_id,mileage_price,mileage_date,mileage_useable from mileage m where mem_id = #{param1}
select count(*) from mileage where mem_id = #{param1}
SELECT * FROM board WHERE board_num = #{param1}
select * from board where board_orinum in (select board_orinum from board b where mem_id = #{param1}) ORDER BY board_orinum DESC , re_num asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( board_title,board_orinum,board_type,mem_id,board_content )VALUES( #{board_title},(select ifnull( max(board_orinum),0)+1 from board b),1,#{mem_id},#{board_content})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM BOARD B JOIN `MEMBER` M ON B.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID WHERE B.MEM_ID = #{loginId} OR (MEM_GRADE ='ADMIN' AND BOARD_ORINUM IN (SELECT BOARD_ORINUM FROM BOARD where mem_id = #{loginId}))
